post.text:
We need to build an inclusive economy that helps everyone get ahead, including Americans with disabilities. Learn more about Hillary's plan, live from Orlando.

For live closed captioning, watch Hillary's speech here: youtu.be/r3B1cMe_DFI

comment.author: Danielle
comment.text: Lita Rosa when Hillary becomes president, feel free to turn down any benefit she may offer.

replies.author: Shawna
replies.text: She will do, if you give her a good Congress that don't put stones in the way

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: Do you think these people who hate her with one face and won't turn down the benefits with the other face..they will be the first ones with their hands out! !!

replies.author: Shawna
replies.text: Kelsey , why they hate her?? Has you listen the people?? Many people loves to Hillary. The people who hate her is because has listen and believed all the lies that the big liar Donald Trump has said and all of that stupid false videos edited by his corrupts hackers and his own corrupts followers.
